scripts.python-check: npm run python-coverage && npm run python-flake8 && npm run python-genbadges
scripts.python-coverage: coverage erase && coverage run manage.py test -t ./ && coverage report && coverage html && coverage xml
scripts.python-flake8: flake8 --exit-zero --format=html --htmldir ./reports/flake8 --statistics --tee --output-file ./reports/flake8/flake8stats.txt ddnsadmin iptablesadmin ircstatus networkadmin serverstatus tservice
scripts.python-genbadges: genbadge tests -v -o reports/junit/junit-badge.svg && genbadge coverage -v -o reports/coverage/coverage-badge.svg && genbadge flake8 -v -o reports/flake8/flake8-badge.svg
